title: Not getting an S on Xayah
body:
Okay so like, I just played 2 games on Xayah. I won both, but the problem is that on the first game the game was 35 mins and I was 6/4/12 with 250 farm. In the 2nd game it took us 25 minutes and I was 14/2/11 with 160 farm and I got a quadra kill, but I got an A+ on both. So like the first one i'd understand why I got an A+, but then in 2nd game why didn't I get an S? Like this makes 0 sense, how are these 2 games worth the same grade?!
{{sticker:sg-janna}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: You're doing a fantastic job, don't let not getting an S get you down.  Per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, your grade will be dependent on your performance as well as all other players who also played your champ in the same role.  It's not just specific to your current match.  Keep at it, and you'll get there!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Komjx88r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-19T20:29:39.315+0000)
>
> You're doing a fantastic job, don't let not getting an S get you down.  Per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, your grade will be dependent on your performance as well as all other players who also played your champ in the same role.  It's not just specific to your current match.  Keep at it, and you'll get there!

Thank you :3
